  • Variables

In Python, a variable is a symbolic name that refers to a value stored in memory. It acts as a "label" or "container" for data, allowing you to store, manipulate, and reuse values in your code. Variables are nothing they are just memory locations. They are stored in RAM.Their are diffrent variable present in python for example integer,float,double etc.
